alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Fulton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 7:21PM EDT until June 22 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Bedford County in south central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Fulton County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 720 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Clearville, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bedford, Breezewood, Warfordsburg, Clearville, Everett, Crystal Springs, Needmore, Lake Gordon, Locust Grove, Barnes Gap, Inglesmith and Manns Choice. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 70 from mile markers 147 to 170. The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 149 to 165. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
